dcterms:creator: Ondrej Bojar
Yvette Graham
Amir Kamran
dcterms:description: The WMT17 segment-level into-English datasets consist of data from seven different source languages, with 560 different texts each. Every text carries a reference translation and a machine translation, with a human annotation labelling how closely the machine translation relates to the reference.
dcterms:title: WMT17 segment-level into-English datasets
